name: @hansogj/discogs-cover
description: A library and CLI to find and download album cover art from Discogs.

scripts.build: pnpm clean && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.types.json
scripts.prepack: pnpm format:check && pnpm test &&  pnpm build
scripts.post:update: rm -rfv node_modules && pnpm prune && pnpm i
scripts.update:majors: npx npm-check-updates -i -t latest && pnpm run post:update
scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates -i -t minor && pnpm run post:update

author: hansogj
